title: indexing is not working correctly
body:
i've just done a fresh install of owncloud 6.0 and the linux desktop client 1.5, i'm uploading some files and i see that it creates the records in the oc_jobs table (eg {"app":"search_lucene","klass":"oca\\search_lucene\\hooks","method":"doindexfile","parameters":"{\"path\":\"\\\/self-ssl\\\/server.csr\",\"user\":\"test\"}"} ) and they are managed by the cron (each minute).

but even if the job is about indexing i don't see any new record in the oc_lucene_status, only when i try to search from the field at the top it start to index all the files.

the problem it always reindex all files, and with thousands of them it takes a while before being able to search for something
